name: Gold Miner Joe
description:
Yeehaw!

Help Joe explore the legendary four-shafted gold mine in this cartoon-style JUMP & RUN game.

Yoink all gold nuggets spread over 50 glittering GOLD MINES, but beware of the sneaky KENTUCKY brothers who won't hesitate to fire your rump full of salt!

* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *

GAME FEATURES:

- 50 GOLD MINES to explore
- Bonus levels packed with treasures
- 8 SECRET GEMS to uncover
- Dynamite sticks to blow stuff up
- Innovative SWIPE controls tailored for touch screens
- D-Pad controls (optional)
- And much more...

TECH FEATURES:

- Game Center support
- MFi controller support
- ION Arcade controller support
- Universal App (iPad, iPhone, iPod Touch)

* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *

Enjoy another Donut Games release!
